MATCH (a:Article)-[:MENTIONS]->(o:Organization)
WHERE o.nbrEmployees < 1000 AND o.isDissolved = false
RETURN a.title, a.date, a.author, a.siteName
ORDER BY a.date DESC
LIMIT 3

question: Name the top 3 organizations in terms of revenue that are headquartered in countries with developing economies.

RETURN o.name AS organization, o.revenue AS revenue
